meanings.definition: Not yet fully developed or mature
meanings.sent1: The young bird was unfledged and still growing its feathers.
meanings.sent2: The unfledged idea needed more time to become a complete plan.
meanings.sent3: The unfledged chef burnt the toast three times in a row.
meanings.sent4: Her unfledged talent for painting blossomed into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The unfledged plant struggled to survive without proper care.

meanings.sent1: The unfledged intern was eager to learn and improve.
meanings.sent2: She felt unfledged in her new job but was determined to succeed.
meanings.sent3: The unfledged driver accidentally took the wrong turn.
meanings.sent4: His unfledged attempts at playing the guitar were met with encouragement.
meanings.sent5: The unfledged swimmer hesitated before diving into the pool.

meanings.definition: Not having developed feathers or wings
meanings.sent1: The unfledged chicks chirped loudly in the nest.
meanings.sent2: The unfledged ducklings followed their mother closely.
meanings.sent3: The unfledged penguin slipped on the icy surface.
meanings.sent4: The unfledged eaglet clumsily attempted its first flight.
meanings.sent5: The unfledged owlet peered curiously from its nest.
